name: Alex The Reaper Kids Adventure Platform Game
name_original: Alex The Reaper Kids Adventure Platform Game
description: Alex The Reaper is an adventure filled running, shooting, platform, jumping game featuring a host of cute but grim characters. Play as Alex the Reaper, Wild Wes, Boxing Bobby or Wolvetween as they battle the elements of the graveyard. Shoot, dodge or jump over the scary guys - from tiny khepri bugs to angry robots you'll have to run pretty fast to avoid them! Collect cash and power ups on the way and become the Reaper King as you play against your friends.Features full game center integration for shared fun.
